description:
I didn't really know when to air this video. It's not really a solo, nor a Serviced video. It more like a This Got Out of Hand video.
You saw Corbin last month doing his G:hOle debut. At the time I mentioned we had done a solo that I wasn't too thrilled with the shaved up look he showed up with- shaved pubes, armpit hair, chest. But for the G:hOle video he had grown out his hair and just looked a whole bunch hotter...like the tough guy he is.
I asked him to re-shoot the video with his new look, and we scheduled it about a week later.
But before he left, he said it was hot seeing me turned on by sucking his dick, and that he thought he could suck dick. At the time he was trying to figure out how much more of this "gay stuff" would fit his limits.
So he arrived for the re-shoot of the solo, and he was VERY relaxed- you can tell how he is literally poured into the couch. Before we got settled though, he kept saying he was curious about doing more. I told him that sure, we could find more projects where he can explore and test his limits, not thinking this would be that video.
We're shooting the video and he does this "My hand is cramping thing," which made me laugh, but I wasn't missing a chance to suck on him again.
Then things just snowballed from there.
~sigh~
title: Bryan & Corbin - Serviced
